Name: Spookish
Description: This fish is very black and grey. It is medium sized and is a very mysterious fish. These fishes are hard to catch, but do offer a lot of attributes. Spookish has the shape of a waning crescent and has 3 tails. The face is towards the rounded side of the shape of the fish and the fish is often seen as "spooky" - yet the same Spookish.
